formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the config which holds all the connection information. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Tenant ID:
formElement.documentation: ID of the tenant to use.

formElement.label: Image name:
formElement.documentation: The display name for the new image.

formElement.label: Disk format:
formElement.documentation: The disk format of a VM image. Valid values are AKI,AMI,ARI,Raw,iso, vhd, vdi, qcow2,vmdk.

formElement.label: Container format:
formElement.documentation: The container format for new image.Valid values are aki, ari, ami, bare, or ovf.

formElement.label: Is image location a local file ?:
formElement.documentation: Select checkbox if the source image file is residing on local machine.

formElement.label: Image path:
formElement.documentation: Path of the image on local machine or the valid and direct URL to image location.

formElement.label: Size:
formElement.documentation: Size of raw image file from which image will be generated.

formElement.label: Checksum:
formElement.documentation: The checksum of raw image file.

formElement.label: Min-Ram:
formElement.documentation: Minimum ram requirement in MBs to run this image on a server.

formElement.label: Min-Disk:
formElement.documentation: Minimum disk space requirement in GBs to run this image on a server.

formElement.label: Owner:
formElement.documentation: The ID of the owner, or tenant, of the image.

formElement.label: Results Location:
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/OpenStack/deployed).

formElement.label: Results tag:
formElement.documentation: The unique tag for this provision to keep it separate from other deployments stored in the same location (default is $[jobStepId]).
